p: Protection of supercoiled plasmid (%) = (Intensity of supercoiled plasmid)/(Intensity of original pUC plasmid band not incubated with Fenton reagent) × 100, Protection of nicked plasmid (%) = (Intensity of nicked plasmid)/(Intensity of original pUC plasmid band not incubated with Fenton reagent) × 100.
